Description: Calcite plaque of Pahemnetjer: incised on one side with the name and titles of the High Priest of Ptah, Pahemnetjer. It was a foundation-deposit. The plaque is badly chipped along the edges. There are no traces of colour.
Bibliographic references: Bierbrier 1982 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 10. (pl.38-39)
Condition: Fair. The plaque is badly chipped along the edges.
